name: redux-detector
description: Redux extension that allows to dispatch next actions after detected state change.

scripts.build:umd: npm run compile && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack lib/index.js
scripts.build:umd:min: npm run compile && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack lib/index.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
